professions.name: Front-End Web Developer
advantages: I create applications and web sites using modern front-end  technologies and tools, like ES6, React, Redux, Webpack (<1>get to know my skills</1>).
The projects, that I've created so far, are: companies and personal web sites as well as applications focused on polishing programming skills (<1>see my portfolio</1>).
I have some experience with back-end technologies - sometimes I use PHP and MySQL.
I have the ability to design user interfaces. What helps me with it, is rich experience in the field of graphics. I pay big attention to the UX issues.
I'm constantly developing my skills - lately I've finished comprehensive scholarship program sponsored by Google: Udacity Front-End Web Developer Nanodegree (<1>check my education</1>).

professions.name: Graphic Designer
advantages: I have rich editorial practice, including i.a. graphic layouts designing, DTP, preparing for printing.
I have broad qualifications in the field of graphics software. The tools I know the best are: CorelDraw, Adobe Photoshop, InDesign, Illustrator.

My skills were appreciated during the competition National Review of Sightseeing and Tourist Books – travel guide, that I prepared, received III prize: for „[...] modern editorial style, usability [...]”.

professions.name: Cartographer
advantages: I have big experience in creating various maps: tourist maps, wall maps, school maps, city plans...
I have the ability to use systems for processing spatial information (I know Global Mapper).
For „Atlas regionalny województwa łódzkiego” constituting my master's thesis, I received the award in the competition organized by Ministry of Transport and Construction.
